title.value: Damping signatures at JUNO, a medium-baseline reactor neutrino oscillation experiment
title.justification: This is the exact title listed on the paper.
title.quote: Damping signatures at JUNO, a medium-baseline reactor neutrino oscillation experiment

extractions.description: This paper presents a study on the detection of damping signatures from new physics models at the Jiangmen Underground Neutrino Observatory (JUNO). The focus is on exponential damping factors in neutrino oscillation probabilities, induced by models such as quantum decoherence, neutrino decay, neutrino absorption, and wave packet decoherence. The authors analyze how well JUNO can constrain these damping parameters and differentiate the various models.

type.justification: The study involves data analysis, simulations, and empirical assessments related to damping signatures in neutrino oscillations.
type.quote: we present a systematic study of the possible damping effects at the JUNO detector.

name.justification: The primary focus revolves around applying data analysis techniques, likely involving deep learning, to study neutrino oscillations.
name.quote: we present a systematic study of the possible damping effects at the JUNO detector.

name.justification: The specific focus is on the neutrino oscillations and damping signatures in the JUNO experiment.
name.quote: We study damping signatures at the Jiangmen Underground Neutrino Observatory (JUNO), a medium-baseline reactor neutrino oscillation experiment.
